name: JebJump
description:
Game Notes

Jeb Jump is an endless runner where you can collect coins or harness the power of the coins with the MAGNET!!!

Full Release Info

 The game is in a beta state though and with the full release will come, ways to spend your coins in style such as grabbing your self a Jeb Pass where you level your way though cool player colours, short colours, top colours, background music and more Coins, to spend in the shop which will also be available. You will also get more bang for your buck by using the arcade machine! the one place you can play video games (Almost) at your hearts content as you'll have to pay 1 Jeb coin for each round you play. Don't stress to much though as all the coins you collect now will be saved (Unless You Delete The Game)! And there will be In game transactions, so you can actually play at your hearts content. There will also be stats that show your lifetime stats and the stats for the last round you played (NOTICE Some Stats will not currently save and should be fixed by the next beta update). With the full release will also be setting control so you can enhance your performance or quality to the max potential of your machine.

Things To Look forward for in the future!!

. Keep an eye out RTX users as in the future there will be Ray Tracing support!

. Weekly updates on a Friday

And more to be announced soon!!!

Please report any bugs in game here.
